desc: Support the SOSM and the Pacific Balance Pinniped Society by wearing our "Save Our Salmon" clothing featuring a seal eating a pacific salmon. Our mission is to bring the out-of-control populations of seals and sea lions back into historical balance by harvesting to help restore our depleted salmon stocks.

layout.text: Our one and only mission is to bring the out-of-control populations of seals & sea lions back into historical balance to help restore our depleted salmon stocks.
